---
applyTo: '**# Features

- Resident Main Page
    
    Home ( File a request button and Check Request Status Button)
    
    File a Request input types:
    
    - Full Name
    - Contact Number
    - Adress
    - Purpose
    - Educational Attainment (if Any)
    - Educational Course (if student)
    - Age
    - Type of Document (Baranggay Clearance, Business Permit, Certificate of Indigency, and First time Job seeker form)
    - ID Upload
    
    Check a Request input type:
    
    - Reference Number
    
    About ( Baranggay staff details )
    
    Contact (baranggay emails and fb page)
    
- Admin Login page
    
    Admin User Authentication
    
- Admin Dashboard
    
    Total amounts of Request, Complaints, Pending Request, and Resolved Complaints
    
     
    
- Admin Request Management Page
    
    Filed requests with there auto incremented reference number, resident name, request type, date upon submission of request, status, and actions(view uploaded id, view full details with the purpose, edit status, option to delete after release)
    
- Admin Complaint Management Page
    
    Encode a Complaint
    
    - Inputs (Complainant Name,  complaint type, description) 
       upon submitting must auto increment a reference number and status of the request into “Pending”.
    - view complaints (reference number, resident name, complaint type, date, actions( view description, edit status, delete the resolved complaint)
    
- Admin Report and Analytics Page
    
    Charts of the weeks request rate for documents and complaints resolution rate.
    
    Descriptive type of information about the charts./*'
